name: cddl-languageserver
description: A language server extension for the Concise Data Definition Language (CDDL)
author: Andrew Weiss <andrew.weiss@outlook.com>

cddllsp.maxNumberOfProblems.description: Controls the maximum number of problems produced by the server.

cddllsp.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the language server.

scripts.vscode:prepublish: npm run compile && npm run link:wasm
scripts.wasm: cd .. && wasm-pack build --out-dir cddl-lsp/server/cddl-ls-pkg --release --target nodejs -- --features lsp && sed -i -e 's/"name": "cddl"/"name": "cddl-languageserver"/g' cddl-lsp/server/cddl-ls-pkg/package.json
scripts.link:wasm: cd server/cddl-ls-pkg && npm link && cd .. && npm link cddl-languageserver
scripts.postinstall: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ..
